text.textblock: Also Beginning on the Northerly right-of-way line of Texas State Highway No. 327 at a point which lies S. 04
E., 150 feet; N. 66
E., 500 feet; S. 71
E., 7450 feet from the Southeast corner of said A-35; Thence, N. 04
W. 1300 feet; Thence, S. 86
W. 3750 feet; Thence, N. 03
W., 2600 feet; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 13,500 feet along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 66
W., 1200 feet, along the North right-of-way line of Texas State Highway 327, to the Point of Beginning.
Survey and Abstract No.:
Jacob Hall; A-31.
Portion:
Part of said A-31 described as follows: Beginning on the North line of said A-31 at a point which lies N. 87
E., 2800 feet from the Northwest corner of said A-31; Thence, N. 87
E., 400 feet, along the North line of said A-31; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 15,500 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 86
W., 950 feet, along the South line of said A-31; Thence, N. 05
W., 850 feet; Thence, N. 29
W., 900 feet; Thence, N. 07
W., 550 feet; Thence, N. 41
W., 900 feet; Thence, N. 26
W., 1750 feet; Thence, N. 00
W., 1100 feet; Thence, N. 10
W., 1650 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the South line of said A-31 at a point which lies N. 86
E., 2750 feet from the Northwest corner of the L. De Lesslie Survey, A-35; Thence, Easterly, approximately 2600 feet, along the Southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 86
W., 1700 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Survey and Abstract No.:
Henry Binns; A-6.
Portion:
Part of said A-6 described as follows: Beginning on the South line of said A-6 at a point which lies N. 87
E., 5850 feet from the Southwest corner of said A-6; Thence, N. 03
E., 1125 feet; Thence, S. 85
E., 600 feet, along the South right-of-way line of the A.T. and S.F. Railroad; Thence, Southerly, approximately 2000 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 87
W., 500 feet, along the south line of said A-6, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning at a point of intersection of the Westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek with the North right-of-way line of A. T. and S. F. Railroad which lies N. 87
E., 600 feet and N. 04
E., 400 feet from the Southwest corner of said A-6; Thence, N. 85
W., 600 feet; Thence, N. 01
E., 1800 feet; Thence, N. 11
W., 1750 feet; Thence, 1400.85 feet; Thence, N. 88
E., 1400 feet, along the South right-of-way line of Farm Road 418; Thence, Southerly, approximately 10,000 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the North line of said A-6 at a point which lies N. 87
E., 4300 feet from the Northwest corner of A-6; Thence, N. 87
E., 2100 feet, along the North line of A-6; Thence, Southerly, approximately 1000 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence S. 88
W., 2300 feet, along the North right-of-way line of Farm Road 418; Thence, S. 73
W., 400 feet, continuing along said North right-of-way line; Thence, N. 04
W., 600 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the North line of said A-6 at a point which lies N. 87
E., 6550 feet, from the Northwest corner of A-6; Thence, N. 87
E., 766 feet; Thence, S. 32
E., 693 feet; Thence, S. 88
W., 500 feet, along the Northerly right-of-way line of Farm Road 418; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 1000 feet, along the easterly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Survey and Abstract No.:
A. Hampton; A-30.
Portion:
Part of said A-30 described as follows: Beginning on the North line of said A-30 at a point which lies N. 88
E., 5400 feet, from the Northwest corner of said A-30; Thence, N. 88
E., 1300 feet, along the North line of said A-30; Thence, Southwesterly, approximately 14,000 feet along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 87
W., 1100 feet; Thence, N. 04
W., 1500 feet; Thence, N. 16
E., 1306.04 feet; Thence, N. 41
E., 1500 feet; Thence, N. 68
E., 1100 feet; Thence, N. 11
E., 2000 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the South line of A-30 at a point which lies N. 87
E., 5600 feet from the Northwest corner of the Henry Binns survey, A-6; Thence, N. 05
W., 900 feet; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 1500 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 87
W., 800 feet, along the South line of said A-30, to the Point of Beginning.
